forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 57F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Windy this evening. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 6C. WNW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
